item.title: CISA Issues Binding Operational Directive for Improved Cloud Security
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
CISA’s Binding Operational Directive 25-01 requires federal agencies to align cloud environments with SCuBA secure configuration baselines.

The post CISA Issues Binding Operational Directive for Improved Cloud Security appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Industry Moves for the week of December 16, 2024 - SecurityWeek
item.description: Explore industry moves and significant changes in the industry for the week of December 16, 2024. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and shifts.

item.title: BeyondTrust Patches Critical Vulnerability Discovered During Security Incident Probe
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
A critical vulnerability in BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access and Remote Support could lead to arbitrary command execution.

The post BeyondTrust Patches Critical Vulnerability Discovered During Security Incident Probe appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: AI Regulation Gets Serious in 2025 – Is Your Organization Ready?
item.dc:creator: Alastair Paterson
item.description:
While the challenges are significant, organizations have an opportunity to build scalable AI governance frameworks that ensure compliance while enabling responsible AI innovation.

The post AI Regulation Gets Serious in 2025 – Is Your Organization Ready? appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Exploitation of Recent Critical Apache Struts 2 Flaw Begins
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Researchers warn of malicious attacks exploiting a recently patched critical vulnerability in Apache Struts 2 leading to remote code execution (RCE).

The post Exploitation of Recent Critical Apache Struts 2 Flaw Begins appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Hacker Leaks Cisco Data
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
IntelBroker has leaked 2.9 Gb of data stolen recently from a Cisco DevHub instance, but claims it’s only a fraction of the total. 

The post Hacker Leaks Cisco Data appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Facebook Owner Hit With 251 Million Euros in Fines for 2018 Data Breach
item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.description:
EU privacy watchdogs hit Facebook owner Meta with fines totaling 251 million euros after an investigation into a 2018 data breach that exposed millions of accounts.

The post Facebook Owner Hit With 251 Million Euros in Fines for 2018 Data Breach appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: CISA Seeking Public Comment on Updated National Cyber Incident Response Plan
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
CISA has updated its National Cyber Incident Response Plan in line with the changing threat landscape and is now seeking public comment.

The post CISA Seeking Public Comment on Updated National Cyber Incident Response Plan appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Webinar Today: Navigating Your OT Cybersecurity Journey: From Assessment to Implementation
item.dc:creator: SecurityWeek News
item.description:
Learn how to develop a holistic solution that provides you and your team the power to mitigate cyber threats effectively within your OT environment.

The post Webinar Today: Navigating Your OT Cybersecurity Journey: From Assessment to Implementation appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Man Accused of SQL Injection Hacking Gets 69-Month Prison Sentence
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Vitalii Antonenko has been sentenced to 69 months in prison for hacking, but he is being released as he has been detained since 2019.

The post Man Accused of SQL Injection Hacking Gets 69-Month Prison Sentence  appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Organizations Warned of Rise in Okta Support Phishing Attacks
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Okta has warned customers that it has seen an increase in phishing attacks impersonating its support team.

The post Organizations Warned of Rise in Okta Support Phishing Attacks appeared first on SecurityWeek.
